Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® and Nomex® sewing thread.
DuPont® Kevlar® is available in continuous filament yarn, cut staple fiber, pulp and some roll goods forms. Most of these products are sold to converters who make fabrics, ropes and cables, composites or other high strength and high performance products for use by finished goods manufacturers
Attached you will find a link to companies that use Kevlar® and Nomex® to manufacture sewing thread for potential use in your application. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=17&prodNum=17
Where to buy other products made with Kevlar® and Nomex® http://protectiontechnologies.dupont.com/kevlar-where-to-buy-information
Please continue to visit our DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar® and Tyvek® as well as other DuPont products.
